tourBios.curYearHigh: On the leaderboard throughout the 2015 PGA TOUR Champions National Qualifying Tournament and eventually finished solo eighth to earn conditionally exempt status on the circuit in 2016...Among the top three times in his nine starts on the European Senior Tour -- T9 at the Acom Jersey Open, T17 at the Prostate Cancer UK Scottish Senior Open and finished T18 at the WINSTONgolf Senior Open.

tourBios.otherVics: (5) 1985 French Amateur Championship. 1994 Dutch Challenge. 1999 Estoril Open. 2004 Open de France Alstom. 2005 Open de France Alstom.
tourBios.curYearHigh: On the leaderboard throughout the 2015 PGA TOUR Champions National Qualifying Tournament and eventually finished solo eighth to earn conditionally exempt status on the circuit in 2016...Among the top three times in his nine starts on the European Senior Tour -- T9 at the Acom Jersey Open, T17 at the Prostate Cancer UK Scottish Senior Open and finished T18 at the WINSTONgolf Senior Open.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Played full time on the European Tour between 1997 and 2008...Thirty-five years after France last celebrated a home winner of the French Open, he delighted the record crowd with a magnificent seven-stroke victory over Australian lefthanders Richard Green and Nick O'Hern at Le Golf National in 2004. The victory was made all the sweeter as Jean Garaialde, the last Frenchman to win the oldest of the continental Opens in 1969, was there at the prize presentation to hand the trophy to Remesy...Repeated the feat the following year when he successfully defended his title after a thrilling duel with compatriot Jean Van de Velde, emerging victorious after the first hole of a sudden-death playoff...After 12 consecutive trips to the European Tour Qualifying School, his patience and persistence was rewarded when he won the 1999 Estoril Open.
tourBios.personal: Almost gave up the game when he failed to gain a card in 1998 but visits to a sports psychologist over the winter persuaded him to persist.
tourBios.priorYearSeason: Made 11 starts on the European Senior Tour with his best effort a T4 at the MCB Tour Championship.
